channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Apple’s Upgrade Decision—Just 6 Weeks To Change Your iPhone
item.description: This decision changes iPhone for hundreds of millions of Apple users.

item.title: iOS 26.2.1: Apple Suddenly Releases Surprise iPhone Update With Key Features And Fixes
item.description: Recently, it looked like a minor iPhone update was coming, but then it vanished without trace. Now, it’s just gone live.

item.title: Six Top Smart Home Trends From 2026 CES Tech Expo
item.description: The massive CES technology expo that took place in January 2026 showcased numerous smart home innovations. Here were six worth noting.
